creditline: Vermillion Archival Collection, Gift of Mr. and Mrs. George McKay Reid
description: Sculptural abstraction featuring a large red elliptical object with an orange center surrounded by black spiraling lines. Print with hand-drawn additions.
medium: Lithograph key plate printed in black with additions in pastel, acrylic, black chalk, charcoal, and graphite on paper; working proof
provenance: Vermillion Editions Limited, Minneapolis; Mr. and Mrs. George McKay Reid, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 1986.
title: Fold-Out
